content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring items between entities.

### Coal Extraction and Processing Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing extracted coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) processing coal.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring items between entities.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without sufficient inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity. This will prevent errors related to insufficient inventory.

### Errors due to full storage chests
- Regularly check and empty storage chests to prevent mining operations from halting due to full storage warnings. This will ensure continuous operation of mining drills.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placement to avoid conflicts with existing entities.
